introduction: Dean "The Wolverine" Pyles is (Mark Stone), an Ex-Special Forces Soldier that moves back to his hometown, when his past comes back to haunt him over a promise he made to his dad. Severely injuring a boy using the Martial Arts training he had received his whole life, puts Mark, his family, and friends in the path of a group of bullies, that will stop at nothing to get at Mark, even terrorizing the entire town. What is holding Mark to his promise? Will he put together the pieces and STOP THE BULLYING? Or will he let it go and let everyone suffer, including himself, remaining "The Coward".
